opponent.label: Jura Basil Elden
opponent.description: Second-in-command Dread fighter pilot on the team that defends the starship Nirvana, crewed by pirates from the all-female colony of Mejare. Even at her young age, Jura represents her homeworld's highest standards of beauty---and vanity.

epilogue.description: WARNING: This epilogue is legacy content featuring older art. A new, expanded version is in the works!
